You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sc;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2abc/index.htm U+02ABC].
  * `&sc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/227b/index.htm U+0227B].
